Deep in the Wood

Event

previous event
next event

27/09/2019

From 20:00 to 23:00

Nijverheidskaai 29
1080 Molenbeek

Maturing in barrels.

25 â‚¬ p/p

Do you like round, voluptuous, smooth and mouth filling wines? To discover hints of chocolate, tobacco, vanilla, smokiness and spices. Some wine makers are masters in bringing the qualities of a wooden barrel into their wines, creating complex wines that can accompany a beautiful meal. Discover some treasures from Australia/New Zealand, South-Africa, Europe and North and south America.

You will be provided with enough glasses and tastingnotes, bread and water.

How to subscribe to one of my events?

To subscribe, please fill in the form below en send the following information : Which event you want to subscribe for, how many people are joining te event and the names of all the people that will come. I will send you an e-mail in return to confirm your subscription.
